Articles.Content:
Hi

how to increase 30 parts limit? maybe some cheats-debugs or mods, anyhow? i playing career - think that totally not needed feature... It can be weight, height, symmetry, anything, but not quantity of parts (IMHO).

P.S. In mobile version on Android, Firefox browser - no checkbox for "prefix" and it not creating threat.

Edited May 14, 2015 by heresim
You have to upgrade the VAB I believe

Four factors will limit your size and other craft abilities. Depending on their level the VAB, Launchpad, SPH and Runway will put restrictions on your craft.

Other buildings will put limits on other aspects of your space program.

Edited May 14, 2015 by Tex_NL

Yes, upgrade VAB for part limit increases, and upgrade Launchpad for size and weight increases. Do this by right-clicking the building before you enter it. You will see a button that says "upgrade" and the number of funds required to do so.

just decided to check if somebody reply me... and found it in game for myself! but thanks guys

---

topic can be closed

Edited May 14, 2015 by diomedea
